response.answer_text: My company can help you automate this solution, We have  designed  a 2 way SMS work flow that can automate the response to your  most frequently asked question's.  The system can be configured to send Asset's such as manual's, white papers, How to Video's through SMS/MMS and can also an trigger outbound Phone calls and email.  Our Platform is hosted in the cloud so we can integrate with your internal or outsourced call center agents by setting up a custom routing Queue as well as  provide transcript's of the conversation. Many contact center's will provide the bodies but not all are set up with the platform that can facilitate the service, If you can automate most of the service or come to the table with the platform I think you can save money and give the consumer a great experience.
